At last!I have uploaded a picture from my computer onto the internet.My profile picture has made it on screen!
For some unknown reason today the create posts page had many add ons.What's going on here?!

Ok i was happy earlier on but now i'm down in the dumps.I wanna make an image my background but i don't seem to know how.If there is anyone out there who knows how to do this,plz tell me exactly how.I need more colour,I need a way to place my background image,I need to know how to place it.Help me!

I have achieved the unachievable.I got 2nd highest in my Math Class Test.Whoopee.I have also successfully added music onto my blog.I'm sure you can recognise it.If you don't then I feel sorry for you.Adios for now!

I was just talking with my mom when she asked me when my cousin was gonna log in to MSN messenger.I told her i didn't know and that the last time my cousin logged in was 10 days,2hours and 12 minutes ago.Then she asked me wether that meant my cousin logged in 10 days ago and stayed online for 2 hours.When i told her no and why,she said i was wrong.I really don't understand the way parents think.They're stuck in a time long,long ago!
Great spooky movie that doesn't end the way you would expect it to.A must see!F.Y.I its a flash movie,very short. urlLink Click here

Ok,here's the deal!I have a group project to finish by Friday and i forgot to pass the diskette with everything inside to the only guy in my group who has Microsoft Powerpoint.One of my classmates was crying after lunch today, for reasons unknown.But,who am I to nose around!Several of my books have lost their plastic covers and ppl make fun of me!That pisses me off...a lot!I also forgot to get several important documents done and signed!I can only say one thing, "MY GAWD!!"

My god!My friend just told me of a game which was 'good'.Apparently, her idea of fun is violence!The game is about super mario, a gun, many baddies and no ending or purpose.If you wanna play it go urlLink here !However, I must warn you! If you have weak stomachs, DO NOT TRY IT!

hello,y'all! This is my 1st ever blog! A great success if u ask me!Today was a very good day for me.Went to school and three of my teachers weren't there!Yahoo!Guess you can figure out what that means!Well, more from me soon!C'ya.

I have decided to remove my display pic.I have officially become like air, you can't see me but you know i'm there.In other news, I have been introduced to a comical rpg called The Kingdom of Loathing.Very funny places there like Mt. Noob,The Gourd Tower, Cobb's Knob. And what crazy characters: Seal clubber,Turtle tamer,Pastamancer,Sauceror,Disco bandit and accordion thief.But it is also kinda puzzling(enter continuum transfunctioner:ring any bells?)Aw....what the hell!just go there and urlLink play ! It makes you build stuff in air!(believe me or not)
